member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the document viewer handles mouse events.

member.remarks: The page count may differ from the document page count due to settings.

member.name: P:FirstFloor.Documents.Controls.DocumentViewer.PageIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the 0 based index of the current page.

remarks.para: Page index -1 is used to identify there is no current page
Valid page index values range from -1 to minus 1.

member.name: P:FirstFloor.Documents.Controls.DocumentViewer.PageNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets the current page number (1 based).

remarks.para: Page number 0 is used to identify there is no current page
Valid page numbers range from 0 to the total number of pages of the current document

member.name: P:FirstFloor.Documents.Controls.PageContextBase.IsInUse
member.summary: Determines whether the page is in use and the associated fixed page should be loaded.
member.value: true if this instance is in use; otherwise, false.

remarks.para: When set to true, the associated fixed page is loaded asynchronously and the PropertyChanged event will be raised accordingly.

member.summary: Determines whether this page instance is the owner of the dynamically loaded fixed page.

member.name: T:FirstFloor.Documents.Controls.VirtualizingPageCollection
member.summary: Represents a virtualizing collection of pages from a single XPS document.

remarks.para: The provides access to all pages of an XPS document and only keeps the fixed pages in memory that are in use. The collection uses the internally to perform on-demand asynchronous fixed page loads.

member.summary: Creates the page item for specified page content.
member.returns: The created page item used for databinding.
